comment: I could feel the difference between the hibiki 21 and Thia special edition. Regardless it has very similar Flavours but the slight peatiness does come off a bit rough (I dislike peat). For the price it's probably a better pick than the 21 but not sure.
Had it few years before, very good feeling and bottle .
Sweet, floral with a soft hint of vanilla and stone fruit. Adding a few drops of water gives it a rich soft texture
Huge fan of the bottle and the whisky is beautiful as well ;)

A lovely presentation, with a richer flavour and nose to the regular Habiki Harmony.

floral nose and flavours with a hint of cherry.
A tad bit too sweet. Nice smooth smell of vanilla. A bit of orange on the pallate. Long finish.
